did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Cornell University. School of Hotel Administration. Statler Hotel.

did.physdesc: Correspondence, publications, records, financial statements, bulletins.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence of Professor Charles I. Sayles; files concerning Statler's new wing, 1952-1959; correspondence regarding equipment; construction and engineering publications; and other records of Cornell's Statler Inn. Also, financial statements from the Statler Inn and Alice Statler Auditorium; photograph of Statler Hotel and Inn employees, Christmas, 1986; and "Statler Hotel and Conference Center Operating Criteria," 1987-1988.
Also Statler Inn registration cards for Harry Truman, April 20, 1960; Barry Goldwater, January 26-27, 1961; and Robert Kennedy, September 28-29, 1964.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Cornell University School of Hotel Administration, Statler Inn records, 1928-1988, #28-3-1801. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
